Duda-Mara Totem Spirit:
Oh, really? OK, go ahead and tell me... First, see if you can find any ritual liquor! But don't get it from Kakai's warehouse. If you want to become a hot roaring fire that will last throughout the winter, you must first learn to soothe the spirits while in peril, get it? I've heard of a chef named Donath in the northern part of Goddard Territory near the hot springs that makes* Bitter Cold Vodka*.
